title: Gender and Crime with Sunny Gunessee (STUDENT SPECIAL)
description: In this episode, Sunny Gunessee discusses the issue of gender and crime, ore specifically he talks about whether theories on women and crime are still relevant and significant to the current growth of female crime being seen in many Western societies.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Sunny Gunessee discusses the issue of gender and crime, ore specifically he talks about whether theories on women and crime are still relevant and significant to the current growth of female crime being seen in many Western societies.
